description: This file defines a React component 'TR181Tree' which provides a hierarchical browser interface for TR-181 parameters. It includes state management, data fetching via API calls, and rendering a UI for navigating paths and viewing parameters.

methods.name: TR181Tree
methods.description: React functional component rendering a hierarchical view of TR-181 parameters, with search and navigation capabilities.

methods.name: fetchTree
methods.description: Fetches the hierarchical tree data from the API based on the current root path.

methods.name: fetchParameters
methods.description: Fetches parameters matching the current path and search term from the API.

methods.name: navigateToPath
methods.description: Updates the root path state to navigate through the hierarchy.
